locale.name: C
locale.long: Defines the behavior of backscape key.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Defines the behavior of delete key.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Path to the default custom command json file.
locale.long: Path to the default custom command json file. If is blank or the json file is not in a proper format the terminal context menu will be built without custom commands. If the file is a valid json with recognized structure theterminak context menu will be buit with the commands read inside.

locale.name: C
locale.long: When debug mode is enabled, logs are printed in the standard output where Guake as been launched

locale.name: C
locale.long: Path to the default shell. Set to empty to use default user shell. If invalid path is set here, guake will fallback to user shell.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Display to appear on if the mouse_display option is not set. If this is set to an invalid value (as in the case of removing a screen from a system), the invalid value is automatically updated to the current primary screen.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Give focus to guake if tab is opened (OBSOLETE).
locale.long: If the guake window is out of focus but open, enabling this will give it back the focus instead of closing the window.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The number of scrollback lines to save in history.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Set max length of the tabs names
locale.long: Controls the maximum length of the tabs names. Maximum length: 100, Minimum length: 1. 0 = unlimited length.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Appear on the mouse display. This overrides any setting in display_n.

locale.name: C
locale.long: 0: Never 1: If process is running 2: Always. Also prompts on quit.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Ask for confirmation when quitting Guake.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Command line pattern to start a editor.
locale.long: This property gives the command line to execute when doing a Quick Open. You can enter the following python string pattern in it: '%(file_path)s' will be replaced with the full path to the captured filename, '%(line_number)s' will be replaced by the line number if found (set to the empty string otherwise).

locale.name: C
locale.long: If this property is set as true, guake will open a text editor when the user does a Ctrl+Click on a filename printed in the terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Quick open the file in the current terminal.
locale.long: If this property is set as true, guake will use the current terminal to execute the Quick open feature. Use if you want to inherit your terminal environment in your text editor

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true and a key is pressed, the terminal is scrolled to the bottom.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, whenever there is new output in the terminal, it will scroll to the bottom.

locale.name: C
locale.short: If guake must show a control to make resizing more handful
locale.long: When true, guake shows a resizer on its bottom to allow user resize guake.

locale.name: C
locale.long: When true, the program will start in fullscreen mode.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Startup script to execute when guake starts
locale.long: This property allows you to execute a startup bash script each time guake starts. You can configure your initial tab settings within this script. Please see the command line argument of guake ('guake --help') for complete help.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Makes tab bar on top of the Guake window. Per default, tabs appears bellow the terminal. Setting this to True will move the tab on top of the terminal. Requires a restart.

locale.name: C
locale.short: If the tabs bar must be visible in fullscreen
locale.long: Set it as false to enjoy guake's fullscreen.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the system alert sound will be played on a bell character.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, Guake will use the GNOME monospace default font.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the commands in terminal will be executed in a login shell.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Use palette font and backgrount colors
locale.long: If true, the terminal font and background colors will use the value defined in the palette. If false, it will use the value defined by the user.

locale.name: C
locale.long: When true, popup notifications will be shown when Guake starts.

locale.name: C
locale.long: When true, scrollbar is visible.

locale.name: C
locale.long: When true tray is visible.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, the terminal will flash on a bell character.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Use terminal titles for tab naming
locale.long: Any terminal program can set the terminal's title via special escape sequences. Some shells (e.g. bash) display user's prompt there (though you can adjust that to any arbitrary text in bashrc or similar) and update it automatically as the prompt changes. So you can have easy automatically updating meaningful tab titles with this option turned on.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Place Guake at: 0: center, 1: left, 2: right

locale.name: C
locale.long: Percent of the screen that will be used by guake terminal vertically.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Determine if guake hides on lose focus.
locale.long: If this property is set as true, guake will be hidden when the main window lose the focus (when Alt+Tab be pressed for example).

locale.name: C
locale.long: Makes guake window be on top of all other windows in the desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.long: When true, the tab bar is visible.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Place Guake at: 0: top, 1: bottom

locale.name: C
locale.long: Percent of the screen that will be used by guake terminal horizontally.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Percent of the screen that will be used by guake terminal horizontally.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Characters that are considered "part of a word"
locale.long: When selecting text by word, sequences of these characters are considered single words. Ranges can be given as "A-Z". Literal hyphen (not expressing a range) should be the first character given.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Global keybinding to allow user call guake from each place after it's opened without clicks.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Copy the clipboard content.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Paste the clipboard content.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Accelerator to active function that closes the current selected tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Decrease the screen height.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Decrease the terminal transparency.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Increase the screen height.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Increase the terminal transparency.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Move the current tab to the left

locale.name: C
locale.long: Move the current tab to the right

locale.name: C
locale.long: Calls the function to add a new tab in guake window.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Shows the next tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Shows the previous tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Quit Guake.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Shows a dialog to rename the current tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Reset terminal

locale.name: C
locale.short: Search current selected text on the web
locale.long: Accelerator to active function that search on the web the current selected text on the terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the first tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the tenth tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the second tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the third tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the fourth tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the fifth tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the sixth tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the seventh tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the eighth tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Switch to the ninth tab.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Toggle main guake window fullscreen.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Toggle whether guake will hide when it loses focus.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Toggle the terminal transparency from the actual level to 100% and vice versa.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Increase the font size of the terminals.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Additional shortcut for zooming in.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Decrease the font size of the terminals.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Cursor blink mode of the terminal
locale.long: Controls the blink mode of the cursor in the terminals. 0: Follow GTK+ setting, 1: Blink on, 2: Blink off

locale.name: C
locale.long: Controls the shape of the cursor in the terminals. 0: Block, 1: I-Beam, 2: Underline

locale.name: C
locale.long: Background color that will be used in terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Background image that will be used in terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Alpha that will be applied to the terminal background.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Allow displaying bold font in Guake terminal
locale.long: When allow_bold is disabled, any text in Guake terminal intended to print as bold text will be instead rendered as normal text.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Font color that will be used in terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Color scheme that will be used in terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Color scheme name that will be used in terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Font face and size that will be used in terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Ignore multiple presses of the _same_ key within @delay milliseconds.

locale.name: C
locale.short: How long to accelerate in milliseconds
locale.long: How many milliseconds it takes to go from 0 to maximum speed.

locale.name: C
locale.long: How many milliseconds to wait before mouse movement keys start to operate.

locale.name: C
locale.long: How many pixels per second to move at the maximum speed.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Do not accept a key as being pressed unless held for @delay milliseconds.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Beep when a modifier is pressed.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Disable if two keys are pressed at the same time.

locale.name: C
locale.long: List of assistive technology applications to start when logging into the GNOME desktop.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Preferred Mobility assistive technology application to be used for login, menu, or command line.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Start preferred Mobility assistive technology application
locale.long: GNOME to start preferred Mobility assistive technology application during login.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Preferred Visual assistive technology application be used for login, menu, or command line.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Start preferred Visual assistive technology application
locale.long: GNOME to start preferred Visual assistive technology application during login.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default browser for all URLs.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the default browser needs a terminal to run.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the default browser understands netscape remote.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default calendar application

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the default calendar application needs a terminal to run

locale.name: C
locale.long: The application to use for viewing files that require a component to view them. The parameter %s will be replaced by the file's URIs, the parameter %c will be replaced by the component IID.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Default tasks application

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the default tasks application needs a terminal to run

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default terminal application to use for applications that require a terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The exec argument to use for the default terminal application.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Window manager to try first. This key has been deprecated since GNOME 2.12.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Fallback window manager if user window manager can't be found. This key has been deprecated since GNOME 2.12.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The number of workspaces the window manager should use This key has been deprecated since GNOME 2.12.

locale.name: C
locale.long: A list with names of the first window manager workspaces. This key has been deprecated since GNOME 2.12.

locale.name: C
locale.long: How to shade the background color. Possible values are "horizontal-gradient", "vertical-gradient", and "solid".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Have GNOME draw the desktop background.

locale.name: C
locale.long: File to use for the background image.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Opacity with which to draw the background picture.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Determines how the image set by wallpaper_filename is rendered. Possible values are "none", "wallpaper", "centered", "scaled", "stretched", "zoom", "spanned".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Left or Top color when drawing gradients, or the solid color.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Right or Bottom color when drawing gradients, not used for solid color.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Theme used for displaying file icons.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether Applications should have accessibility support.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether buttons may display an icon in addition to the button text.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the user can dynamically type a new accelerator when positioned over an active menuitem.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the cursor should blink.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Length of the cursor blink cycle, in milliseconds.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the default font used for reading documents.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether animations should be displayed. Note: This is a global key, it changes the behaviour of the window manager, the panel etc.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Module to use as the filesystem model for the GtkFileChooser widget. Possible values are "gio", "gnome-vfs" and "gtk+".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the default font used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the input method module used by GTK+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the GTK+ input method Preedit Style used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of the GTK+ input method Status Style used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Basename of the default theme used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Basename of the default theme used by gtk+.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Icon theme to use for the panel, nautilus etc.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Keyboard shortcut to open the menu bars.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the user can detach menubars and move them around.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether menus may display an icon next to a menu entry.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether menus should have a tearoff.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Name of a monospaced (fixed-width) font for use in locations like terminals.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the context menus of entries and text views should offer to change the input method.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the context menus of entries and text views should offer to insert control characters.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to display a status bar meter on the right.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether the user can detach toolbars and move them around.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Size of icons in toolbars, either "small-toolbar" or "large-toolbar".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Toolbar Style. Valid values are "both", "both-horiz", "icons", and "text".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to use a custom font in gtk+ applications.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Disable URL and MIME type handlers
locale.long: Prevent running any URL or MIME type handler applications.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from accessing the terminal or specifying a command line to be executed. For example, this would disable access to the panel's "Run Application" dialog.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user to lock his screen.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from modifying print settings. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Print Setup" dialogs.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from printing. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Print" dialogs.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from saving files to disk. For example, this would disable access to all applications' "Save as" dialogs.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Prevent the user from switching to another account while his session is active.

locale.name: C
locale.long: File name of the bell sound to be played.

locale.name: C
locale.long: possible values are "on", "off", and "custom".

locale.name: C
locale.long: When set to true, GNOME will remember the state of the NumLock LED between sessions.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Font name of the cursor. If unset, the default font is used. This value is only propagated to the X server start of each session, so changing it mid-session won't have an effect until the next time you log in.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Size of the cursor referenced by cursor_theme.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Cursor theme name. Used only by Xservers that support Xcursor, such as XFree86 4.3 and later.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Length of a double click.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Distance before a drag is started.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Swap left and right mouse buttons for left-handed mice.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Highlights the current location of the pointer when the Control key is pressed and released.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Acceleration multiplier for mouse motion. A value of -1 is the system default.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Distance in pixels the pointer must move before accelerated mouse motion is activated. A value of -1 is the system default.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Single click to open icons.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default mixer device used by the multimedia key bindings.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The default mixer tracks used by the multimedia key bindings.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Enable sound server startup.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to play sounds on user events.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether to play sounds on input events.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The XDG sound theme to use for event sounds.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Maximum age for thumbnails in the cache, in days. Set to -1 to disable cleaning.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Maximum size of the thumbnail cache, in megabytes. Set to -1 to disable cleaning.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Set to true to disable all external thumbnailer programs, independent on whether they are independently disabled/enabled.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Whether or not the typing break screen can be postponed.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Number of minutes that the typing break should last.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether or not keyboard locking is enabled
locale.long: Whether or not keyboard locking is enabled.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Number of minutes of typing time before break mode starts.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The command used to handle "callto" URLs, if enabled.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether the specified command should handle "callto" URLs
locale.long: True if the command specified in the "command" key should handle "callto" URLs.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Run the command in a terminal
locale.long: True if the command used to handle this type of URL should be run in a terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The command used to handle "cdda" URLs, if enabled.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Whether the specified command should handle "cdda" URLs
locale.long: True if the command specified in the "command" key should handle "cdda" URLs.

locale.name: C
locale.short: Run the command in a terminal
locale.long: True if the command used to handle this type of URL should be run in a terminal.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The command used to handle "ghelp" URLs, if enabled.

locale.name: C
locale.short: How to display local DNS-SD service
locale.long: Possible values are "merged", "separate" and "disabled".

locale.name: C
locale.short: Extra domains to look for DNS-SD services in
locale.long: Comma separated list of DNS-SD domains that should be visible in the "network:///" location.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Password to pass as authentication when doing HTTP proxying.

locale.name: C
locale.long: User name to pass as authentication when doing HTTP proxying.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The machine name to proxy HTTP through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: This key contains a list of hosts which are connected to directly, rather than via the proxy (if it is active). The values can be hostnames, domains (using an initial wildcard like *.foo.com), IP host addresses (both IPv4 and IPv6) and network addresses with a netmask (something like 192.168.0.0/24).

locale.name: C
locale.long: The port on the machine defined by "/system/http_proxy/host" that you proxy through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: If true, then connections to the proxy server require authentication. The username/password combo is defined by "/system/http_proxy/authentication_user" and "/system/http_proxy/authentication_password".

locale.name: C
locale.long: Enables the proxy settings when accessing HTTP over the Internet.

locale.name: C
locale.long: URL that provides proxy configuration values.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The machine name to proxy FTP through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The port on the machine defined by "/system/proxy/ftp_host" that you proxy through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: Select the proxy configuration mode. Supported values are "none", "manual", "auto".

locale.name: C
locale.long: The machine name to proxy secure HTTP through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The port on the machine defined by "/system/proxy/secure_host" that you proxy through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The machine name to proxy socks through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The port on the machine defined by "/system/proxy/socks_host" that you proxy through.

locale.name: C
locale.long: The Windows networking workgroup or domain that the user is part of. In order for a new workgroup to fully take effect the user may need to log out and log back in.
